name: Dimensional Saviour
description:
Made for blackthornpod game jam. Theme: less is more  Controls

A and D to move,

 Space to jump

 Hold M1 to charge weapon,

release M1 to fire weapon,

 R to change dimension ( teleports to the last position on that dimension),

E to interact.

Story

One day a portal to another dimension has appeared a dimension where everything less is more and everything more is less. Our characters mother fell through a portal one day. Then our character did everything to make her return,  he was forced to go there and return her by himself. Well equipped and well prepared he traveled through dimensions to save his mother.
